channel.title: Leadership on Akshay Shipurkar
channel.description: Recent content in Leadership on Akshay Shipurkar

item.title: Becoming the Team Leader
item.description: The year 2017 has been a great year for me. The year started with the recruitment of the (BONDS) Graduate Engineering Trainees, I was one of the in charge to look over the smooth functioning of the online aptitude tests conducted. The next project was the jio cloud project. Here i was screening candidates, scheduling interviews, keeping track of their progress. The resumes were pouring in my mailbox all the time and around the same time we had one session with the Enterprise team who had come there to get resources from BOND.
